title: 第28期：The warden threw a party in the county jail（嘉宾：DJ BO）

title_detail.value: 第28期：The warden threw a party in the county jail（嘉宾：DJ BO）

author: B，佳杰
summary: 📌 本期内容 Let's rock' everybody' let's rock. Everybody in the whole cell block Was dancin' to the Jailhouse Rock. Dancin' to the Jailhouse Rock... ⏳ 时间轴 00:01:18 演出回顾 00:03:14 主题讨论 01:09:05 专辑推荐 01:12:00 尾声（Big Joe Turner - Shake, Rattle And Roll, Coral Version, DJ BO Edit） 🎸 演出回顾 大伏：为了作曲的即兴和为了即兴的作曲 💬 主题讨论 Rockabilly Definition The Cat King | ETA to Shanghai (MAINLAND CHINA's FIRST ELVIS FESTIVAL DOCUMENTARY/CONCERT FILM) 'Kimchibilly' rock and rollers to stage The Beats Collector "DJ BO" - International DJ DJ BO on His All-Rockin' Roundtable 'The Critical Music Club' I Was the First DJ in North Korea 📀 专辑推荐 水门汀 - 《稍纵即逝 糟选集》 The Routes - 《The Twang Machine》 📋 本期歌单 Elvis Presley - Milkcow Blues Boogie Jerry Lee Lewis - Great Balls Of Fire Jerry Lee Lewis & Sam Phillips - Religious Discussion Trix 'O' Treat - Red Lipstick 👏 嘉宾 DJ BO：Shanghai's #2 DJ，「Critical Music Club」主理人 🎙 主播 B：非主流器乐摇滚乐迷

content.value:
📌 本期内容

Let's rock' everybody' let's rock.
Everybody in the whole cell block
Was dancin' to the Jailhouse Rock.
Dancin' to the Jailhouse Rock...

⏳ 时间轴

00:01:18 演出回顾
00:03:14 主题讨论
01:09:05 专辑推荐
01:12:00 尾声（Big Joe Turner - Shake, Rattle And Roll, Coral Version, DJ BO Edit）

🎸 演出回顾

  • 大伏：为了作曲的即兴和为了即兴的作曲

💬 主题讨论

  • Rockabilly Definition

  • 'Kimchibilly' rock and rollers to stage
  • The Beats Collector "DJ BO" - International DJ
  • DJ BO on His All-Rockin' Roundtable 'The Critical Music Club'
  • I Was the First DJ in North Korea

  • The Routes - 《The Twang Machine》
